recipe.title: The Rehydrator
instructions: Muddle 1/2 cup pitted cherries and 1 tablespoon honey in a pitcher. Add 3/4 cup aloe vera juice, 1/2 cup unsweetened cranberry juice, and 1/4 cup fresh lime juice and stir to combine. Place 1 cup mixture in a cocktail shaker and fill shaker with ice. Cover and shake until outside of shaker is frosty, about 30 seconds. Strain into two coupe glasses. Repeat with remaining mixture.
